source.sqlReaderQuery: select JOB_SCRIPT as SRC_LIST, [SOURCE_SCHEMA] as SRC_SCHEMA,[SOURCE_TABLE] as SRC_TBL,  [TARGET_TABLE] as TGT_TBL from [ADF].[ETL_JOB] WHERE [TARGET_TABLE] LIKE '%DS' and ACTIVE_FLG='Y'
select JOB_SCRIPT as SRC_LIST, [SOURCE_SCHEMA] as SRC_SCHEMA,[SOURCE_TABLE] as SRC_TBL,  [TARGET_TABLE] as TGT_TBL from [ADF].[ETL_JOB] WHERE [TARGET_TABLE] LIKE '%FS' and ACTIVE_FLG='Y'

SELECT [JOB_SCRIPT] AS [SRC_LIST], [SOURCE_TABLE] AS [SRC_TBL], [TARGET_TABLE] AS [TGT_TBL] 
FROM [ADF].[ETL_JOB] WHERE [TARGET_TABLE] LIKE '%D' and ACTIVE_FLG='Y'
SELECT [JOB_SCRIPT] AS [SRC_LIST], [SRC_TABLE] AS [SRC_TBL], [TGT_TABLE] AS [TGT_TBL] FROM [ADF].[ETL_DMS_DWH] WHERE [TGT_TABLE] LIKE '%F'
